original_title: Ponts routiers de la Seine à Paris
overview: "Ponts routiers de la Seine à Paris" is a film series that shows, in a single fixed, wide and silent plan all the bridges (and bridges) that span the Seine in Paris. (Rail bridges and motorway bridges on the ring road are excluded). The bridges are filmed in order, from upstream to downstream. The camera is placed on the left bank and films towards the right bank.
title: Ponts routiers de la Seine à Paris
